title: House hearing debates ways to improve Artemis

title: Falcon 9 launches second Intuitive Machines lunar lander
summary:
Intuitive Machines’ second lunar lander is on its way to the moon after a SpaceX Falcon 9 launch Feb. 26 that also deployed three rideshare payloads.

title: Space industry hunts for ways to adapt to Trump’s trade policies
summary:
Faced with rising costs and supply chain disruptions, the space industry is scrambling to mitigate the financial strain of the Trump administration’s “America First” trade and tariff policies.

title: NASA Remembers Long-Time Civil Servant John Boyd
summary: John Boyd, known to many as Jack and whose career spanned more than seven decades in a multitude of roles across NASA as well as its predecessor, the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics (NACA), died Feb. 20. He was 99. Born in 1925, and raised in Danville, Virginia, he was a long-time resident of Saratoga, […]

title: Fourth Launch of NASA Instruments Planned for Near Moon’s South Pole
summary: Sending instruments to the Moon supports a growing lunar economy on and off Earth, and the next flight of NASA science and technology is only days away.
